text: Wuhan Metro Line 7 () is a metro line in Wuhan. This line connects Hankou urban center with southwestern Jiangxia. ==History and Future Development== {| class="wikitable" style="border-collapse: collapse; text-align: right;" !Segment!!Commencement!!Length!!Station(s)!!Name |- |style="text-align: left;"| Garden Expo North — Yezhihu | 1 October 2018 | | 19 |style="text- align: left;"| Phase 1 |- |style="text-align: left;"| Yezhihu — Qinglongshan Ditiexiaozhen | 28 December 2018 | | 7 |style="text-align: left;"| Zhifang line (Southern Extension) |-bgcolor="lightgrey" |style="text-align: left;"| Huangpi Square — Garden Expo North | under construction | | 11 |style="text- align: left;"| Qianchuan line (Northern Extension) |} ==Stations== {| class="wikitable" !
